name: officedev-copilot-for-m365-plugins-samples-msgext-multiparam-csharp
title: Using multiple parameters in a plugin for Microsoft Copilot for Microsoft 365 using .NET
shortDescription: This sample demonstrates how to use multiple parameters in a plugin for Microsoft Copilot for Microsoft 365 using .NET and Teams Toolkit for Visual Studio Code.
longDescription: This sample demonstrates how to use multiple parameters in a plugin for Microsoft Copilot for Microsoft 365 using .NET and Teams Toolkit for Visual Studio. It demonstrates how developers can use multi parameters in Microsoft Copilot for Microsoft 365 to support complex utterances and deep retrieval.
